header.title: Distributed Erlang

list.item: Chapter 6 Distributed Programming - Describes how to write distributed Erlang applications which run on a network of Erlang nodes.

auth - The Erlang authentication server. Note: The actual authentication has been moved from this process to the handshaking procedure. The man page gives a good description of the principles behind the cookie authentication mechanism however.
global - A global name registration facility.
global_group - Grouping nodes to global name registration groups.
slave - Functions for starting and controlling slave nodes.
